name: Book of Hours
maker: Georges Trubert, Workshop of Jean Bourdichon
description: Book of Hours; Georges Trubert (French, active Provence, France 1469 - 1508), Workshop of Jean Bourdichon (French, 1457 - 1521); Provence, France; about 1480 - 1490; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold and silver paint, and ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with red velvet; Leaf: 11.5 × 8.6 cm (4 1/2 × 3 3/8 in.); Ms. 48; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Book of Hours
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold and silver paint, and ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with red velvet
